Shipping - Amber Us
SHOP SHIPPING
ABOUT CONTACT

Shipping

Amber-Us provides FREE standard worldwide shipping for dog necklaces with a next business day dispatch using Lithuanian postal service. Estimated delivery to EU countries*: 5 – 7 working days from shipment Estimated worldwide delivery*: 10 – 14 working days from shipment You will receive a tracking number when the order is dispatched. *These estimates do not account for delays caused by unexpected deliveryservice disruptions or force major events. For larger orders we use UPS as fast worldwide delivery for additional fee. Estimated fast worldwide delivery: up to 3 working days from shipment

Amber Us

Palanga, 00133

Lithuania info@amber-us.com
